metadata.title: Allergy Eye Itch Relief Eye Drops by Alaway, Antihistamine, 10 mL
features: Eye drops for itch relief: Help relieve eye allergy symptoms caused by pollen, ragweed, grass, animal hair and dander in minutes with these antihistamine eye drops containing ketotifen.

Alaway antihistamine eye drops help provide eye itch relief in minutes and last for up to 12 hours. This prescription-strength formula works right at the source of eye allergy symptoms, so it relieves eye itch faster than most allergy pills.
Do you suffer from eye allergies? If you have eye allergy symptoms, then you know how uncomfortable itching, watering eyes caused by pollen, ragweed, grass, animal hair and dander can be.
Bausch and Lomb Alaway eye care: Since John Bausch opened an optical goods store in 1853, Bausch and Lomb has focused on innovation and quality in eye care products, from contact lenses to eye drops.
description: When allergies make your eyes itch, don't suffer waiting for your allergy pills to work. Created by the eye health experts at Bausch + Lomb, Alaway is clinically tested to relieve the eye itch that allergy patients suffer from.

title: Benefits Of Alaway Eye Drops - Watch Before Buying
for eye itch relief
